Pencil Case: A pencil case that doubles as a portable desk organizer. The case can hold pencils, pens, erasers, and other office supplies, and has a built-in tray for keeping papers and notes organized.

Pencil Sharpener: A pencil sharpener that also acts as a desk organizer. The sharpener has a built-in tray for collecting shavings, and the body of the sharpener can be used to store pens, pencils, and other small office supplies.

Pencil Holder with Built-in Paperweight: A pencil holder that also acts as a paperweight. The holder has a weighted base that keeps papers from blowing away in the wind, and the body of the holder can be used to store pencils, pens, and other office supplies.
Pencil with Built-in Ruler: A pencil with a built-in ruler on one end. The ruler can be used for measuring distances and lengths, and the pencil can be used for writing and drawing.

Pencil with Eraser on the End: A pencil with an eraser on the end, allowing users to erase mistakes and corrections without having to sharpen the pencil. The eraser can be used to correct spelling mistakes, grammar errors, and other mistakes in documents, papers, and other written materials.
